feed.title: Feather Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Elk: v0.13.2
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Show background color for direct post to reduce mistake  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2732 (5064b)
  • Add "How to contribute?" link next to language status  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2733 (de11a)
  • Put sign-in icon to default "Sign in" button  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2736 (611d5)
  • Add "Documentation" link to "About" page  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2734 (aa282)
  • Update info dialog  -  by @patak-dev in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2741 (90254)
  • i18n:
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2737 (43130)
  • Update portuguese from Portugal translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2747 (7dcaf)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2750 (0de98)
  • Add missing spanish translations (gifs, docs and contributing)  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2753 (f86e8)
  • Update portuguese from Portugal translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2756 (f8fc0)
  • ui:
  • Style blockquote  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2744 (d0b11)
  • Improve gif support  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2752 (8f04e)
  • Add max. file size check before upload attachment  -  by @userquin and @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2709 (3f0b2)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Improve keyboard operability especially on search page and editor  -  by @shuuji3 and @patak-dev in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2730 (eee67)
  • Hide duplicated status actions items on details page in zen mode  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2731 (d8d99)
  • Notifications in update timeline  -  by @patak-dev in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2740 (59dda)
  • Adjust background spacing in direct message  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2764 (839aa)
  • ui:
  • Change status actions title  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2717 (f6f50)
  • Prevent from navigating to search page when opening command panel  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2719 (42aeb)
  • Wrong polls are removed  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2720 (28514)
  • Remove a duplicated command  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2718 (587c0)
  • Clicking on custom emoji does not navigate to status detail  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2743 (c6787)
  • Don't scroll on settings item click when external or _blank target link  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2742 (bead2)
  • Media preview card is misaligned  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2751 (1146d)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Elk: v0.14.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add threaded drafts & posts  -  by @maybeanerd, Sebastian Di Luzio, @emanuelpina, @lazzzis, @userquin, @shuuji3, @katullo11, renovate[bot] and @patak-dev in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2715 (1234f)
  • Allow choosing favorite buttons in bottom navigation bar  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2761 (2cb07)
  • Support more than 4 media attachments with 3 columns grid  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2802 (c1f8e)
  • a11y:
  • Add semantic markup to interface settings  -  by @userquin and @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2809 (c504e)
  • i18n:
  • Update hu-HU.json  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2773 (80a8f)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2774 (ab220)
  • Update hu-HU.json - review  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2780 (61265)
  • Update portuguese from Portugal translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2788 (2cada)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2790 (bda2d)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2791 (7b819)
  • Update hu-HU.json  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2789 (8fdac)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2792 (81143)
  • Add spanish threads translations  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2794 (dde90)
  • Update hu-HU.json, thread related strings  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2795 (706cf)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2800 (1d817)
  • Add spanish bottom navigation translations  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2801 (e3979)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2804 (9fa81)
  • Update en-GB localization  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2808 (876ae)
  • Update portuguese from Portugal translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2806 (8697c)
  • Update hu-HU.json  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2813 (e4c71)
  • Update en-GB.json  -  by @asmaloney in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2821 (d4eeb)
  • Add en-CA for Canadian English  -  by @asmaloney in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2820 (4ed97)
  • Update pt-PT language  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2829 (79c67)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2826 (7f4d8)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2827 (9d62e)
  • Update hu-HU.json  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2828 (6f47d)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2825 (56960)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2830 (cc1d1)
  • ui:
  • Add font size outline when focused  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2798 (14162)
  • Add manage list at the end of the lists  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2824 (ecd7a)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • List name is not up-to-date after modification  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2797 (2a6a9)
  • Remove nav buttons from initial selection on setting page  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2803 (9c916)
  • a11y:
  • Add aria-* entries to interface settings  -  by @userquin and @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2799 (6bb9a)
  • i18n:
  • Correct the spelling of Favorite in the US  -  by @at-wr in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2807 (8e5a8)
  • ui:
  • Make display name clickable in grouped follow notification  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2776 (2599c)
  • Fix regression where editor is expanded before composing  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2787 (e0280)
  • ui,a11y:
  • Focus lost when navigating using the keyboard (tab)  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2766 (e53f6)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Elk: v0.15.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Keyboard status navigation with j/k  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2739 (97ce2)
  • Add custom metadata type for PageMeta  -  by @itoao in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2907 (bd7fd)
  • a11y:
  • Add semantic markup to preference settings  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2811 (77f0e)
  • Add semantic markup to language settings  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2812 (70479)
  • i18n:
  • Add manage lists spanish translation  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2832 (1eaaa)
  • Add open image preview dialog spanish translation  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2839 (8ad05)
  • Update pt-PT translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2850 (d1ae4)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2838 (e546e)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2840 (a67b3)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2851 (7d4b8)
  • Update uk-UA.json  -  by @sutnistj in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2852 (ab92f)
  • Update uk-UA.json  -  by @sutnistj in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2854 (9496f)
  • Update hu-HU.json  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2856 (6c2e5)
  • Update zh-CN.json  -  by @TomatoDroid in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2858 (c39b6)
  • Update German translations  -  by @pixelbart in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2861 (0b53d)
  • Update zh-CN.json  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2865 (04bef)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2866 (bd950)
  • Update zh-CN translations  -  by @alexzhang1030 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2868 (a1b5c)
  • Update Finnish localization  -  by @valtlai in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2867 (09b5d)
  • Added greek translation  -  by @trlef19 and @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2831 (65557)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2879 (ca34d)
  • Update French translations  -  by @KaKi87, Anthony Fu and @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/1839 (f15c8)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2937 (538fa)
  • ui:
  • Overlap multiple account icons in notification  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2869 (879f0)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Use correct meta attribute for twitter info  -  by @danielroe (16a09)
  • Bump unstorage and address type issues  -  by @danielroe in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2951 (672e8)
  • Fix invalid permissions-policy value for fullscreen  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2941 (744c1)
  • Top level await (chrome 129)  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2970 (10076)
  • Add new service worker  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2971 (4d95c)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency @vueuse/motion to v2.2.3  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2881 (385f2)
  • Update dependencies  -  by @danielroe in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2526 (23f82)
  • Update dependencies (major)  -  by @danielroe in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2559 (e2255)
  • Update vueuse to v11 (major)  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2922 (b8efd)
  • Update dependencies (major)  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2921 (faae7)
  • Update dependency @vueuse/motion to v2.2.5  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2947 (6fd28)
  • Update dependency prosemirror-highlight to ^0.9.0  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2961 (7aabe)
  • i18n:
  • Update de-DE  -  by @Shinigami92 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2874 (6f7ef)
  • Update tr-TR.json  -  by @edizbaha in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2894 (83de5)
  • Fix redundant Japanese translation  -  by @m1sk9 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2938 (926f7)
  • i18n,a11y:
  • Fix missing or incorrect translations in aria-label strings  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2837 (bd8cf)
  • ui:
  • Show custom emoji in spoiler text  -  by @lazzzis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2836 (57ff0)
  • Fix publish dialog layout  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2842 (09cae)
  • Change apple app status bar style  -  by @DasLixou and @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2903 (20ac0)
  • Fix z-index of horizontal line between statuses  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2778 (d79ad)
  • Adjust z-index of Embedded Media Player and sticky header  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2848 (1d62c)
  • Profile name gets cut off by roles  -  by @Christopher-Hayes in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2915 (71369)
  • Add loading indicator  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2769 (41eb8)
  • Bind attributes to PublishWidgetList list  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2952 (dbf74)
  • Generate only one thread composer in PublishWidgetList and provide it to each widget  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2953 (40610)
  • Composer dialog layout broken  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2955 (01ffb)

   üèé Performance

  • Reduce timeline limit on slow connection  -  by @Shinigami92 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2945 (4caa6)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Elk: v0.15.1
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Prevent reloading page  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2973 (54344)
  • Change page reload and account switch logic  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2975 (44074)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Elk: v0.16.0
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Add 6 new bottom nav buttons  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3011 (ae1da)
  • Add credits to creators in link previews using fediverse:creator  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3012 (41346)
  • Support wider emoji  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3028 (54cc0)
  • Support 'annual_report' notification type  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3084 (fb411)
  • Show pinned posts on individual account page  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2779 (dd407)
  • Bluesky-style follow notification  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3151 (a7d64)
  • a11y:
  • Make menu buttons in 'More' dropdown selectable with the keyboard  -  by @jyn514 and @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2976 (dac42)
  • i18n:
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2967 (3bc6e)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3021 (83fd1)
  • Update pt-PT translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3024 (98a91)
  • Update hu-HU.json  -  by @iamdtms in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3049 (f742a)
  • Finish catalan translation  -  by @saeziae and @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2990 (4c63f)
  • Update pt-PT translation  -  by @emanuelpina in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3097 (3b331)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3098 (d8710)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3099 (371a9)
  • Unify expression in Japanese translation  -  by @m1sk9 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3105 (cadd2)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3116 (6cfad)
  • Add missing Spanish timeline and status translations  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3121 (e986d)
  • Update Japanese localization  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3117 (2c005)
  • Update eu-ES.json  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3154 (44320)
  • Update it-IT locale  -  by @katullo11 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3145 (21027)
  • ui:
  • Disable publish button  -  by @ayoayco in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3085 (fa6c8)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Do not require Git for development  -  by @palant in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3015 (2c830)
  • Remove extra margins before tags  -  by @Onion-L in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3039 (e6ebd)
  • Add basic user-agent to all mastodon-bound requests  -  by @untitaker in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2277 (302da)
  • Apply missing reordering to local public timeline  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3071 (e1b8d)
  • MenuBottom settings are always empty  -  by @Cl0v1s and Clovis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3091 (83513)
  • More menu is not opening on click  -  by @Cl0v1s and Clovis in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3090 (7a52a)
  • Disable publish when be bypassed by Ctrl + Enter  -  by @ippatev in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3133 (a7cd4)
  • Prevent infinite account hover card  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3153 (e4a3c)
  • Remove extra padding and hover effect on dark theme  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3157 (f6a47)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency @unocss/nuxt to ^0.63.0  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2983 (50299)
  • Update dependency @vueuse/motion to v2.2.6  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2991 (d0681)
  • Update dependency happy-dom to v15.10.2 [security]  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3040 (f6265)
  • Update dependency happy-dom to v15.10.2 [security]  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3041 (816f4)
  • Update dependencies (major)  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2994 (beeb3)
  • Update dependencies  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3048 (5753f)
  • Update dependencies  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3094 (49281)
  • Update dependency happy-dom to v16  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3129 (29761)
  • Update vueuse to v12 (major)  -  in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3095 (9a549)
  • i18n:
  • Correct some German translations, also make them more consistent  -  by @palant in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3001 (6e731)
  • Fixed some German out-of-context translations  -  by @palant in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3005 (94405)
  • Improved consistency of the German translation  -  by @palant in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3013 (2f3fe)
  • Allowed translating "No posts here" text  -  by @palant in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3016 (83fce)
  • Update vi-VN.json  -  by @mastoduy in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3020 (86581)
  • Update Basque localisation  -  by @xabirequejo in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3018 (c153f)
  • lang:
  • Update ca-valencia.json  -  by @Ecron in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3146 (39b21)
  • rtl:
  • Replace ellipsis span anchor content with bdi  -  by @userquin in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3123 (e59f5)
  • ui:
  • Fix and adjust bottom navigation preview on setting page  -  by @shuuji3 in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/2818 (90765)
  • Avoid duplicate IDs for grouped notifications  -  by @palant in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3014 (49a5f)
  • Profile avatar image motion setting #3044  -  by @AndrewCrescencio and @null in https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3066 and https://github.com/elk-zone/elk/issues/3044 (00824)
    View changes on GitHub
